title: Nilight - NI -WA 06 LED Light Bar Wiring Harness Kit - 2 Leads 12V On Off Switch Power Relay Blade Fuse for Off Road Lights LED Work Light, 2 Years Warranty,Black
description: Product Features: 10ft wiring harness, 2 sets of connectors to light fixtures illuminated on/off toggle switch - can easily turn on/off the lights. Inline blade fuse & relay - multiple safety protection. Note: Maximum Wattage: 180W; Max Ampere: 15A Operating Voltage: 12V DC Power Please finish the installation by professionals or install the wiring harness under the guidance of professionals.
